### Details: https://spacy.io/models/es#es_core_news_smSpanish pipeline optimized for CPU. ### Accuracy| Type | Score || --- | --- || `TOKEN_ACC` | 100.00 || `TAG_ACC` | 97.29 || `POS_ACC` | 98.20 || `MORPH_ACC` | 97.74 || `LEMMA_ACC` | 98.32 || `DEP_UAS` | 90.42 || `DEP_LAS` | 86.94 || `SENTS_P` | 97.87 || `SENTS_R` | 98.97 || `SENTS_F` | 98.42 || `ENTS_P` | 88.90 || `ENTS_R` | 88.98 || `ENTS_F` | 88.94 |
